metadata.title: USN-3182-1 -- NTFS-3G vulnerability
metadata.description: Jann Horn discovered that NTFS-3G incorrectly filtered environment variables when using the modprobe utility. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to load arbitrary kernel modules.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3182-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ntfs-3g - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.1 ntfs-3g-udeb - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.1 ntfs-3g-dev - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
